mapper.insert: insert into qna(board_num, m_no, board_pass, board_subject,board_content, board_re_ref, board_re_lev, board_re_seq, board_readcount,board_date) values(#{board_num}, #{m_no}, #{board_pass}, #{board_subject}, #{board_content}, #{board_re_ref}, 0, 0, 0, now());
mapper.update: update qna set board_subject = #{board_subject}, board_content = #{board_content} where board_num = #{board_num}
update qna set board_readcount = board_readcount + 1 where board_num = #{board_num};
mapper.select: select board_pass from qna where board_num = #{board_num}
